attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have Cerable paulsey but i also have a curvey spine . i understand we do need a belt on our wheelchair but not looking like an baby harnce and it looks and gives disabled a bad complex to the outside world, but a lap-belt would not look-out of place and   where is our freedom to human rights and freedom choices gone as i feel that i have no voice or human rights left with all the red tape in the uk.
Mrs Joanna Reinlo
a person with a disability and wheelchair user.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
